TextView.android:text:
This is the page where information relevant to the passenger can be displayed. 

This includes information like Departure time of the flight, status of the flight, etc. 
This page can also be used to display KrissFly services, hence providing the means to the passenger to shop.
 The passenger can login by using a combination of unique but temporary details, like Boarding pass number and date of birth. 
In case of offloading a passenger, this page can be used to add credit to the passenger temporary account (should the passenger choose to do so) in the form of compensation.
